name: Kevin Gray
description:
You can call me a true mans “man” with my priorities in order. I am well cultured, well mannered and reserved. I treat people the way I expect to be treated.
I am looking for a lady who is kind and honest. She is curious about the world around her but also supremely confident. Beauty is skin deep. I don’t play games. If you would rather a solid, mature relationship then message me.
